projects.title: ASCII Adventure Portfolio
projects.description: A terminal-style portfolio website with an interactive ASCII adventure game. Explore a Zelda-inspired overworld to discover projects.

projects.title: CliniCore
projects.description: Electronic medical records and practice management platform. Features patient management, clinical documentation, appointment scheduling, and prescription tracking.

projects.title: Lisp Compiler
projects.description: Full compiler for a Lisp-esque language. Implements lexing, parsing, AST generation, control flow graph/IR generation, and optimizations.

projects.title: Arithmetic Parser
projects.description: Recursive descent parser for arithmetic expressions. Demonstrates fundamental parsing techniques and expression evaluation.

projects.title: PyDis
projects.description: Python bytecode disassembler and side-by-side execution visualizer. Features debugging, variable inspection, and I/O tracing.

projects.title: CounterTrak
projects.description: Lightweight Counter-Strike 2 statistics tracker web application. Track your performance and analyze your gameplay.

projects.title: Javarominoes
projects.description: Tetris-inspired block stacking puzzle game built with Java Swing. Dedicated to Granddad.

projects.title: Seas of Yore
projects.description: Medieval Battleship-inspired board game with custom-drawn sprites, new features, and engaging game modes.

projects.title: Presentation Choreographer
projects.description: Programmatic creation and manipulation of PowerPoint files. Powered by Java and the Anthropic API.

projects.title: Learn @ dconn.dev
projects.description: Teaching materials for an extracurricular programming course for students ages 12-16. Static educational content.

projects.title: Draw Shapes
projects.description: Lightweight drawing program with multiple drawing modes, colors, brush sizes, undo functionality, and save/load capabilities.

projects.title: Site Selector
projects.description: Lightweight web browser built in Java. Minimal and functional.
